title: OT74: Copan Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- Scott thanks readers and announces new features to the comment system.
- Scott adds a new moderation policy where he will delete comments that he believes have too high a heat-to-light ratio and bans the term "human biodiversity" and "hbd."
- Scott asks readers to take the 2017 Effective Altruism survey.

Key learnings:
- Scott is becoming more paranoid after the physical and reputational attacks on people for saying "offensive" speech.
- Scott is banning terms that he believes hostile parties could interpret as reason to go Middlebury on someone.
- Scott will be deleting comments he considers to have too high a heat-to-light ratio.

Key questions:
- None.
